00013 // Class to perform 16 bit CRC checksumming.
00014 class ClsCrc16
00015 {
00016 public:
00017     // Constructor/Destructor.
00018     ClsCrc16();
00019     ClsCrc16( unsigned short wPolynomial );
00020     virtual ~ClsCrc16();
00021 
00022     // Implementation
00023     void CrcInitialize( unsigned short wPolynomial = 0x1021 );
00024     unsigned short CrcAdd( unsigned char* pData, unsigned long dwLength );
00025     unsigned short Crc( unsigned char* pData, unsigned long dwLength );
00026     inline void CrcReset() { m_sCRC = 0xFFFF; }
00027     inline unsigned short CrcGet() const { return ( unsigned short )( m_sCRC ^ 0xFFFF ); }
00028     inline unsigned short CrcTableIndex( int nIndex ) const { return m_pCrcTable[ nIndex ]; };
00029 
00030     // Operator overloads.
00031     inline bool operator==( unsigned short wCrc ) const { return ( bool )(( m_sCRC ^ 0xFFFF ) == wCrc ); }
00032 
00033 protected:
00034     // Data
00035     static unsigned short   s_wCrc16[ 256 ];
00036     unsigned short         *m_pCrcAllocated;

00038     unsigned short      m_sCRC;
00039 };
